title: Test Login Successful
manualSteps: 1. Open a new browser tab and navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Wait until the login form is fully rendered (both username and password fields are visible)
3. Locate the username input field by its placeholder text 'Username'
4. Click inside the username field to focus it
6. Type the exact string 'standard_user' into the username field
7. Locate the password input field by its placeholder text 'Password'
8. Click inside the password field to focus it
10. Type the exact string 'secret_sauce' into the password field
13. Wait for the browser to complete navigation
14. Verify the current URL is exactly https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html
15. Verify that the inventory page header or a unique element (e.g., 'Products' title) is visible to confirm successful login
